topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Identifying the first Swift Proxy Server

body.p:
Perform the following steps to identify the first node which is running the swift-proxy service:
Log on to the deployer node.
Edit the following file.vi ~/scratch/ansible/next/hos/ansible/hosts/verb_hosts
Search the entry with the name SWF-PRX-<cloud-name>-<control-plane-name>-<cluster-name>:children.
The server which appears first in the SWF-PRX list is the first Swift Proxy Server.
For example: For cloud mycld, control plane, ccp, and cluster c3 is as follows:[SWF-PRX-ccp-c1:children] mycld-ccp-c3-m1-mgmt mycld-ccp-c3-m2-mgmt mycld-ccp-c3-m3-mgmt
In the above example, the first swift proxy server is mycld-ccp-c3-m1-mgmt.
